09:35		 Development of photon beam diagnostics for VUV radiation from a SASE FEL / Treusch, R ; Lokajczyk, T ; Xu, W ; Jastrow, U ; et al [TESLA-FEL-99-07]
For the proof-of-principle experiment of self-amplified spontaneous emission (SASE) at short wavelengths on the VUV FEL at DESY a multi-facetted photon beam diagnostics experiment has been developed employing new detection concepts to measure all SASE specific properties on a single pulse basis. [...]

09:35		 Non-Abelian Flat Directions in a Minimal Superstring Standard Model / Cleaver, G B ; Faraggi, A E ; Nanopoulos, Dimitri V ; Walker, J W [ACT-2000-1] [CTP-TAMU-2000-2] [OUTP-2000-03-P] [TPI-MINN-2000-6] [hep-ph/0002060]
Recently, by studying exact flat directions of non-Abelian singlet fields, wedemonstrated the existence of free fermionic heterotic-string models in whichthe SU(3)_C x SU(2)_L x U(1)_Y-charged matter spectrum, just below the stringscale, consists solely of the MSSM spectrum. [...]
